resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107131</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107131</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207110</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Saugus Iron Works: Life and Work at an Early American Industrial Site</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saugus Eisen-Arbeiten: Leben und Arbeit an 
einer frühen amerikanischen industriellen Site</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travaux de Fer de Saugus : La vie et travail
à un site industriel américain tôt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalhos Do Ferro De Saugus: Vida e 
trabalho em um local industrial americano adiantado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impianti Del Ferro Di Saugus: Vita e lavoro 
ad un luogo industriale americano in anticipo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργοστάσια σιδήρου Saugus: Ζωή και εργασία 
επί ενός πρόωρου αμερικανικού βιομηχανικού τόπου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajos Del Hierro De Saugus: Vida y 
trabajo en un sitio industrial americano temprano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines life and work at the first successful integrated ironmaking plant in colonial America (from 1646 until 1668, 10 miles north of Boston).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft das Leben und Arbeit am ersten 
erfolgreichen integrierten Eisenproduktionbetrieb in Kolonialamerika 
(von 1646 bis 1668, 10 Meilen Norden von Boston).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine la vie et le travail à la première usine
intégrée réussie de fabrication de fer en Amérique coloniale (de 
1646 jusqu'en 1668, 10 milles de nord de Boston).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina a vida e o trabalho na primeira planta 
integrada bem sucedida do ironmaking em América colonial (de 1646 
até 1668, 10 milhas de norte de Boston).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la vita ed il lavoro nella prima pianta 
integrata riuscita di fabbricazione del ferro in America coloniale (da
1646 fino al 1668, 10 miglia di nord di Boston).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τη ζωή και την εργασία στις πρώτες επιτυχείς
ενσωματωμένες ironmaking εγκαταστάσεις στην αποικιακή Αμερική 
(από 1646 μέχρι 1668 ..10 μίλια βόρεια της Βοστώνης).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina vida y el trabajo en la primera planta 
integrada acertada de la producción de hierro en América colonial (a
partir de 1646 hasta 1668, 10 millas de norte de Boston).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207110</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107131</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/saugus-iron-works-life-and-work-at-an-early-american-industrial-site</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
